ai_analysis.summary: Descript's AI video editor has updated its interface and marketing messaging, emphasizing ease of use and automated design capabilities. While the technical advancements are notable, they do not represent a breakthrough innovation. The business impact is moderate, as the updates may attract more users and enhance the company's market position, but do not signify a major launch or acquisition.

changes.title: Descript: Edit Videos & Podcasts Like a Doc | AI Video Editor
changes.content_preview:
Title: Descript: Edit Videos & Podcasts Like a Doc | AI Video Editor

Features

Underlord

For work

Pricing
Contact sales
Resources
Sign in
Sign up
Make video faster. Make more of it. And make it good.
Make any video you want to make

Direct your AI co-editor to turn your vision into video, or do it yourself with intuitive editing tools. With Descript, making video is as easy as typing.

Upload a recording to edit

Upload

OR

Get Started
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	

These companies use Descript. Not bad!

No skills? No idea? We got you.

You don’t have to know what makes a video look good, or how to make it look that way. Descript automatically does it for you—so anybody can create finely crafted video that grabs viewers by the eyeballs.

	
	
Make it pretty

Apply layouts for instant, elegant design. You have dozens to choose from, all created by video pros—but you can customize them however you want. Or save your own branded layout packs for quick recognition.

ai_analysis.summary: Minor update to the Descript website, with a change in the call-to-action from 'Get started for free' to 'Clean recording'. The update does not indicate significant technical advancements or major business impact, but rather a refinement of the existing AI-powered audio repair feature.

changes.title: AI-powered audio repair | Regenerate audio to make impossible edits possible
changes.content_preview:
Title: AI-powered audio repair | Regenerate audio to make impossible edits possible

Features

Underlord

For work

Pricing
Contact sales
Resources
Sign in
Sign up
Don’t re-record. Regenerate.
Fix mismatched tone, enhance lackluster dialogue, or remove background noise. Descript’s AI instantly repairs audio & regenerates voices to match the surrounding tone, smoothing over even the clunkiest cuts, so it sounds like they never happened.
Clean recording ->
	
	
See how it works

Trusted by teams at

Make impossible edits possible

Smooth over awkward edits

Ever try to edit out a section of audio only to find it creates a wild mismatch in the speaker’s tones? Regenerate fixes that by recreating their voice with AI, then matching the tones so your edit sounds perfectly natural.

Liven up lackluster dialogue

No edit can fix a moment where your speaker seems to trail off mid-sentence. But Regenerate can. It injects a lively spark into lackluster performances, so you can turn something death

This indicates a notable technical advance in AI-powered video editing tools and a moderate business impact through the provision of useful resources and features for creators.

ai_analysis.summary: Descript's AI-powered audio repair feature, Regenerate, leverages AI to repair audio and regenerate voices, enabling seamless edits and improved audio quality. This innovation has significant technical relevance and notable business impact, particularly in the media production and audio editing industries.
